survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: Welcome!
go left

I see that I am currently at the starting point. I will go left. 
I have reached a small island with a tiger on it. What should I do next?
go back

Alright, I will go back to the starting point. 
I am now back at the starting point. What should I do next?
go forward

Okay, I will move forward from the starting point. 
I have reached a small island with a butterfly on it. What should I do next?
go back and then go right

Got it. I will go back to the starting point first, and then I will go right.
I am now back at the starting point. What should I do next?
go right

Alright, I will go right from the starting point.
I have arrived at a big island with a parrot sitting on a tree. What should I do next?
keep going forward on that path

Understood. I will continue going forward on the path from the big island with the parrot.
I have reached another big island, and I see an elephant here. What should I do next?
keep going forward on the same path

Okay, I will continue going forward on the same path from the big island with the elephant.
I have arrived at a small island with a frog on it. What should I do next?
keep going forward on that same path

Got it. I will continue going forward on the same path from the small island with the frog.
I have arrived at another small island. Here I see a crocodile. What should I do next?
keep going on the same path

Alright, I will keep going on the same path from the small island with the crocodile.
I have arrived back at the big island with the elephant. What should I do next?
go back the other way where the crocodile was

Got it. I will go back the way I came, towards the crocodile.
I have arrived back at the small island with the frog. What should I do next?
Keep moving forward on that same path

Okay, I will continue moving forward on the same path from the small island with the frog.
I have arrived at a new island where I see a giraffe. What should I do next?
Keep going forward on that same path

Alright, I will keep going forward on the same path from the island with the giraffe.
I have reached another small island, and there is a snake here. What should I do next?
keep moving forward on the same path

Okay, I will continue moving forward on the same path from the island with the snake.
I have reached the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
move forward on the path
You cannot move forward from the starting point as there is a wooden bench blocking the path. Try turning left (west) instead. What do you see to your left?
Go left on the path
Great! Now you're heading left (west) on the path. As you continue, you'll come across a trail. Do you see anything familiar on the trail?
a bench
That's correct! There is a bench on the trail. Now, instead of reaching the bench, turn left again and cross the trail. Describe what you see after crossing the trail.
Turn left and cross the trail
Fantastic! After crossing the trail, you should now be back on the path heading east. Keep going until you see a white dog nearby. Can you spot the dog?
Keep going east on the path until you see the white dog nearby
You got it! Now, just near the white dog, there is a wooden branch that crosses a river. Cross over the branch and head south. What do you see next to the river?
a flower stand
Oops! Sorry for the confusion, but you shouldn't reach the flower stand just yet. Instead, after crossing the branch, continue heading south. Look around, what can you see next to the river?
a deer

Apologies for the confusion earlier, but there shouldn't be a deer next to the river. Let's go back to the previous step. After crossing the wooden branch, you should be heading south. What is there next to the river?
A blanket
Hmm, let's give it another try. After crossing the wooden branch and heading south, you should come across a picnic. Do you see a red and white checkered blanket nearby?
yes

Great! Now we're back on track. As you approach the picnic, you'll see a bowl of berries on a mat. Touch the berries and then continue your journey. Which direction do you need to go after touching the berries?
Touch the bowl of berries and continue south
Apologies for any confusion earlier, but you don't actually need to touch the berries. Let's correct our course. After the picnic, turn west. What do you see after turning west?
After the picnic turn west
Fantastic! After turning west, you'll come across another wooden branch that crosses the river. Cross over the branch and continue in which direction?
west

Great job! After crossing the wooden branch and heading west, you'll notice a green bush. Instead of going directly to the bush, circle around it from the right side. Can you see the florist stand ahead?
yes

Excellent! You're making great progress. Now, turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. As you continue, you'll approach a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Go past the bridge to which direction?
Go past the bridge and continue moving forward

Almost there! After passing the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench and reading newspapers. Move a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. What do you see next to the branch?
a deer

Not quite! But let's try again. After passing the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Move a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. What is next to the branch?
a bush

Apologies for the confusion earlier. You're on the right track now! After passing the bridge, moving a few steps south, and going between the elderly people and the wooden branch, you should see a green bush. Now, which direction should you go after reaching the bush?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Move forward and then hang a left on the path

I see a tent to the north of me, and a dog sitting to the south of the tent. On the right, I see a fire, and on the left, I see a red mushroom. South of the mushroom, there is a blue car. Should I move forward from the tent and then hang a left?
Yes go toward the blue car
Great! I'm now standing in front of the blue car. What should I do next?
Continue forward on the same path until you see the telescope
Got it! I'll continue moving forward on the path from the blue car. Now I see a blue telescope in front of me. What's the next step?
Hang a right at the telescope
Alright, I will hang a right at the telescope. Now I'm heading west. What's the next instruction?
Continue west until you see the cabin
Understood! I will continue heading west until I see the cabin. What should I do after reaching the cabin?
Thats the destination
Great! I've reached the wooden cabin. That means we have finished! Thank you for guiding me through the map. Is there anything else you need help with?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Go forward until you see the dog
Great! You're off to a good start. So, you said to go forward. Can you describe where you are now and what you see around you?
A dog and rocks
Perfect! You're on the right track. Now, facing the dog, turn slightly to your left and keep going. Let me know what you find along the way!
Go slightly left until you see the speaker and tent

Great job! You're doing fantastic. Now, facing the speaker and tent, veer slightly left and head towards the north-west. Keep going until you can see what's between the speaker and the tent. Describe what you see once you get there!
rocks
Good job! You've reached the rocks. Now, continue heading north. Tell me what you find as you go!
a ball
Well done! You're making great progress. Proceed to the north, passing between the ball and the rock beside it. Keep going and let me know what you encounter next!
a canoe
Great job! You're almost there. Now, turn right and head towards the west, passing underneath the canoe. After that, let me know what you see ahead!
a shark
Fantastic job! You're really acing this. Now, make a sharp turn to your right, away from the shark. Once you've made the turn, describe what you see in front of you!
a crab
Great job! You're almost there. Now, face the crab and turn right, following the path along the big rock. Let me know what you come across next!
a dog

Oops! It seems like we've taken a wrong turn. Let's backtrack a bit. Facing the crab, turn around and go back to the shark. Once you're back at the shark, make a sharp turn to your right. Keep going and let me know what you see ahead this time!
a ball
Oh no, we made another wrong turn. Let's retrace our steps again. Face the shark and turn left, away from the ball. Follow the path back and let me know what you encounter next!
a rock
Great! You've found the rock again. Now, facing the rock, turn right and head towards the land. Once you're back on land, describe what you see in front of you!
palm trees

Awesome! You're back on track. Now, facing the palm trees, turn slightly left and head towards the northwest. As you go, you will see a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Keep going and let me know once you pass between them!
rocks
Great job! You're doing amazing. Now, continue heading northwest, passing between the rocks. Keep going until you reach the shoreline. Let me know when you get there!
there
Excellent work! Now, once you reach the shoreline, turn right and walk along the water. Tell me what you encounter as you continue along the shoreline!
a shark

Oops, it seems like we took a wrong turn again. Apologies for the confusion. Let's go back to the shoreline. Face the shoreline and turn left, away from the shark. Follow the shoreline and let me know what you see ahead this time!
a crab
Great job! You're getting closer. Now, face the crab and turn right, following the shoreline. Continue along the shoreline and let me know what you see next!
rocks
Perfect, you're on the right track! Keep following the shoreline and make note of any landmarks or objects you see. Let me know when you come across something different or interesting!
more rocks

Hmm, it seems like we've encountered some confusion again. My apologies for that. Let's retrace our steps. From the crab, turn left and head back along the shoreline. Let me know what you find as you continue along!
shark
Oh, looks like we made another wrong turn. Sorry about that. Let's retrace our steps once again. Facing the crab, turn right and continue along the shoreline. Let me know what you see next.
a ball
Great job! You're back on track. Now, facing the ball, turn right and head towards the north. Keep going and describe what you encounter next!
a tent

Perfect! You're doing great. Now, circle around the tent in an arc and continue heading south towards the sea. Once you reach the shore, turn right and go below the red kayak. Let me know once you've done that!
done
Awesome job! You're almost there. Now, turn right and head north along the kayak. As you go, be on the lookout for a small green bush. Let me know once you reach it!
reached the bush
Hooray! You did it! Congratulations on finding the small green bush. You have successfully completed the path. Well done!
thank you

You're very welcome! It was a pleasure guiding you through the path. Great job on following the instructions. If you ever want to explore the map or go on another adventure, just let me know. Keep up the fantastic navigation skills!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

general_survey.answer: That they speak multiple languages daily
